description: Google Drive is a cloud storage service by Google that enables users to store, sync, share files, and collaborate online.
name: googleDrive
title: Google Drive

actions.description: Copy a selected file to a different location within Google Drive.
actions.name: copyFile

properties.description: The id of the file to be copied.
properties.name: fileId
properties.label: File

properties.description: The name of the new file created as a result of the copy operation.
properties.name: fileName
properties.label: New File Name

properties.description: The ID of the folder where the copied file will be stored.
properties.name: parentFolder
properties.label: Destination Folder

actions.title: Copy File

actions.description: Creates a new empty folder in Google Drive.
actions.name: createNewFolder

properties.description: The name of the new folder.
properties.name: folderName
properties.label: Folder Name

properties.description: Folder where the new folder will be created; if no folder is selected, the folder will be created in the root folder.
properties.name: parentFolder
properties.label: Parent Folder

actions.title: Create New Folder

actions.description: Creates a new text file in Google Drive.
actions.name: createNewTextFile

properties.description: The name of the new text file.
properties.name: fileName
properties.label: File Name

properties.description: The text content to add to file.
properties.name: text
properties.label: Text

properties.description: Folder where the file should be created; if no folder is selected, the file will be created in the root folder.
properties.name: parentFolder
properties.label: Parent Folder

actions.title: Create New Text File

actions.description: Delete a selected file from Google Drive.
actions.name: deleteFile

properties.description: The id of a file to delete.
properties.name: fileId
properties.label: File

actions.title: Delete File

actions.description: Read a selected file from Google Drive file.
actions.name: readFile

properties.description: The id of a file to read.
properties.name: fileId
properties.label: File

actions.title: Read File

actions.description: Uploads a file in your Google Drive.
actions.name: uploadFile

properties.description: The object property which contains a reference to the file to upload.
properties.name: fileEntry
properties.label: File

properties.description: Folder where the file will be uploaded; if no folder is selected, the file will be uploaded to the root folder.
properties.name: parentFolder
properties.label: Parent Folder

actions.title: Upload File

actions.description: Retrieve a specified file from your Google Drive.
actions.name: getFile

properties.description: The id of a file to be retrieved.
properties.name: fileId
properties.label: File

actions.title: Get File

triggers.description: Triggers when new file is uploaded to Google Drive.
triggers.name: newFile
triggers.title: New File

triggers.description: Triggers when new file is uploaded to Google Drive.
triggers.name: newFolder
triggers.title: New Folder
